Posts.Content: I think it's our nature as women to worry! It's nice that you're following up on any new thing. I wish they didn't have to keep you waiting, though. Praying that it's nothing to worry about!!
Posts.Title: new here...breast lumps

Posts.Content: How did your tests go? I have a second mammo and ultrasound in 3 days, too. Hope all went well!!
Posts.Title: new here...breast lumps

Posts.Content: Just read your post - hope all went well. I'm at your exact situation, going for my second mammo and ultrasound tomorrow, and I'm stressed to say the least (more out of concern for my kids, though). Anyhow, I sincerely hope all went well with you and your concern is long forgotten! :-)
Posts.Title: Really Scared. Have to go back in for 2nd Mammogram
